info.name: Archy XR Mobile API - v2.0 Final
info.description:
Complete mobile API collection for Archy XR with corrected access control, project browsing, file management with LOCATION SUPPORT, user assignment with EMAIL SUPPORT, and comprehensive testing.

ğŸ”‘ KEY FEATURES:
â€¢ Corrected User Access Control (Users can view ALL projects but work only on assigned ones)
â€¢ Project Browse endpoint separate from assigned projects
â€¢ Complete File CRUD with Location Support (latitude/longitude)
â€¢ File download capabilities with signed URLs
â€¢ User Assignment Management (Assign/Unassign users by ID OR EMAIL)
â€¢ Email-based user assignment for mobile apps (no more UUID lookups!)
â€¢ Comprehensive role-based testing
â€¢ Fixed database schema issues
â€¢ Complete workflow testing

ğŸ“Š ACCESS CONTROL MATRIX:
| Role      | View Projects | Create | Modify | Delete | Download Files | Assign Users | Assign by Email |
|-----------|---------------|--------|--------|---------|-----------|--------------|-----------------|
| Admin     | All projects  |   âœ…   |   âœ…   |   âœ…   |     âœ…     |      âœ…      |        âœ…       |
| User      | All projects  |   âŒ   |   âŒ   |   âŒ   |     âœ…     |      âŒ      |        âŒ       |
| Archivist | Only assigned |   âŒ   |   âŒ   |   âŒ   |     âœ…     |      âœ…      |        âœ…       |

ğŸ“ NEW MOBILE ENDPOINTS:
â€¢ File Download: GET /api/mobile/projects/{id}/files/{fileId}/download
â€¢ File Upload with Location: POST /api/mobile/projects/{id}/files (with lat/lng)
â€¢ File Details: GET /api/mobile/projects/{id}/files/{fileId}
â€¢ Partial File Update: PUT /api/mobile/projects/{id}/files/{fileId} (location, name)
â€¢ File Delete: DELETE /api/mobile/projects/{id}/files/{fileId}
â€¢ User Assignment by ID: POST/DELETE /api/mobile/projects/{id}/users (userId)
â€¢ User Assignment by EMAIL: POST/DELETE /api/mobile/projects/{id}/users (email)
â€¢ List Project Users: GET /api/mobile/projects/{id}/users
â€¢ Enhanced mobile-optimized responses with success/error structure
â€¢ Backward compatible with existing admin panel APIs

ğŸ“§ EMAIL ASSIGNMENT FEATURES:
â€¢ Assign users by email address (no UUID lookup required)
â€¢ Remove users by email address (mobile-friendly)
â€¢ Automatic user validation and error handling
â€¢ Clear error messages for non-existent emails
â€¢ Enhanced mobile app integration support

ğŸ“ LOCATION FEATURES:
â€¢ Upload files with GPS coordinates (latitude/longitude)
â€¢ Update file location without re-uploading file
â€¢ Coordinate validation (-90/90 lat, -180/180 lng)
â€¢ Partial updates (update only location, name, or both)
â€¢ Remove location data by setting to null
â€¢ Mobile-optimized for GPS-enabled devices

Updated: August 2025 - Production Ready with Location & Email Support
